attributes.additional_details:
To save the airship hanger number 1 at Cardington in Bedfordshire.

This historic building played a major part in the victory of Britain during the Great War and Second World War. It has now fallen into disrepair , and is being dismantled to make way for housing developments.This site has massive historical importance in the history of Britain, and has also had huge commercial use over the years.I want the Government to stop the redevelopment of this site immediately.
